data.title: Watch What I Like About You Online
data.meta_description: Looking to watch What I Like About You? Find out where to watch What I Like About You from Season 2 at TV Guide
data.text:
Episode 1

I Love You...Soon

Thu, Sep 11, 2003 30 mins

Holly tells Henry that she loves him, a slip of the tongue that strains their relationship. Elsewhere, Valerie accepts a date with her new boss (Stephen Dunham). Nicole: Courtney Rackley. Vince: Nick Zano. Henry: Michael McMillian. Lauren: Leslie Grossman. Gary: Wesley Jonathan. Holly: Amanda Bynes. Valerie: Jennie Garth.

Where to Watch

Episode 2

Boys' Club

Thu, Sep 18, 2003 30 mins

Valerie feels slighted by her boss when he gives a new client whom she recruited to a pair of male co-workers. Meanwhile, Holly upsets Henry when she leaves the dentist's office during his surgery to help Valerie out of a jam. Peter: Stephen Dunham. Alan: Eamonn Roche. Jose: Paul Webster. Nurse: Eileen Rogers.

Where to Watch

Episode 3

When Holly Met Tina

Thu, Sep 25, 2003 30 mins

Valerie tries to land a client by getting Holly to befriend the client's teenage daughter, but their plan goes awry when Holly tries to take the fall for the daughter's reckless behavior. Tina: Allison Munn. Judith: Carolyn Hennesy. Peter: Stephen Dunham. Lauren: Leslie Grossman.

Where to Watch

Episode 4

The Loft

Thu, Oct 2, 2003 30 mins

Holly tries to persuade a rich, incarcerated man to let her and Valerie move into his loft so that Valerie can have her own office. Jay: Terry Rhoads. Karen: Casey Wallace. Landlord: R. Barry Moore. Tina: Allison Munn.

Where to Watch

Episode 5

Like a Virgin (Kinda)

Thu, Oct 9, 2003 30 mins

Holly learns that Henry had sex while in a previous relationship, so she and Tina set out to meet his old flame. Meanwhile, Lauren persuades Valerie to spend a workday relaxing at the loft and spices things up by hiring a pair of masseurs. Shannon: Megan Fox. Delivery Guy: Jace Milstead. Tina: Allison Munn. Henry: Michael McMillian.

Where to Watch

Episode 6

No More Mr. Nice Guy

Thu, Oct 16, 2003 30 mins

Valerie finds Holly in a compromising position with Vince on their apartment terrace on a night when Henry is studying with friends. Elsewhere, Valerie keeps running into her former boss at a local gym. Becky: Desi Lydic. Vince: Nick Zano. Henry: Michael McMillian. Peter: Stephen Dunham. Gary: Wesley Jonathan.

Where to Watch

Episode 7

I'm Sorry, So Sorry

Thu, Oct 23, 2003 30 mins

Holly and her friends try to get Tina to apologize to her boyfriend for insulting him, in hopes of salvaging a planned ski weekend. Elsewhere, Lauren turns to Valerie for help with landing a new man. Greg: Brian McGovern. Cal: Philipp Karner. Todd: Charlie Koznick. Tina: Allison Munn.

Where to Watch

Episode 8

Partially Obstructed View

Thu, Oct 30, 2003 30 mins

Holly lies to Henry about how she got front-row seats to a concert because she doesn't want him to know that Vince was with her at the time. Meanwhile, Valerie goes to a bachelor event honoring Peter and other eligible men. Glen: Brandon Quinn. Peter: Stephen Dunham. Vince: Nick Zano. Henry: Michael McMillian.

Where to Watch

Episode 9

Absence Makes the Heart Grow...Never Mind

Thu, Nov 6, 2003 30 mins

Holly examines her feelings for Henry after he goes on a weekend visit to Princeton; and Gary awaits his girlfriend's return from France. Elsewhere, Valerie takes a business trip to Chicago and runs into Peter, who's there with a female companion. Jill: Anicka Haywood. Maureen: Alexondra Lee. Peter: Stephen Dunham. Henry: Michael McMillian.

Where to Watch

Episode 10

The Odd Couple

Thu, Nov 13, 2003 30 mins

After a fight with his dad, Henry moves in with Vince, an arrangement that Holly finds troubling as she frets over her attraction to Vince. Meanwhile, Lauren persuades Valerie to try a speed-dating service. Martha: Margaret Easley. Tim: Lou Saliba. Paul: David Ackert. Jack: Brady Smith. Henry: Michael McMillian. Vince: Nick Zano.

Where to Watch

Episode 11

Regarding Henry

Thu, Nov 20, 2003 30 mins

After they have a fight, Holly goes looking for Henry, who overheard a conversation that revealed one of her secrets. Henry: Michael McMillian. Vince: Nick Zano.

Where to Watch

Episode 12

The Incredible Shrinking Group

Fri, Jan 9, 2004 30 mins

Holly asks Gary to trick Henry into meeting with her, but the plan backfires and strains the bonds of friendship among all of them. Elsewhere, Valerie swears off sugar and tries to persuade Lauren to join her. Henry: Michael McMillian. Gary: Wesley Jonathan. Lauren: Leslie Grossman.

Where to Watch

Episode 13

The Hospital

Fri, Jan 16, 2004 30 mins

Vince is injured while delivering a package and ends up in the hospital, where he kisses Holly for the first time when she comes to visit; Valerie and Lauren compete for the attention of a cute doctor. Dr. Turner: Ken Marino. Nurse Lorraine: Sybil Azur. Vince: Nick Zano. Holly: Amanda Bynes. Lauren: Leslie Grossman.

Where to Watch

Episode 14

Your Cheatin' Heart

Fri, Jan 23, 2004 30 mins

Holly's ready to date Vince after seeing Henry with a new girl, but her plans are derailed when she finds Vince with someone else. Elsewhere, Gary gets a new job at a store that requires him to work shirtless, much to the delight of female customers. Rick: Ed Kerr. Waitress: Patrice Jennings. Girl: Kara Houston. Tyhler: Tracey McCall. Vince: Nick Zano.

Where to Watch

Episode 15

Sky Rink Sucks

Fri, Jan 30, 2004 30 mins

Gary upsets Holly when he says that he wants to take Vince's advice and celebrate his birthday at a club rather than at their usual skating-rink outing. When Holly confronts Vince about his meddling, she runs into Gary's ex-girlfriend, who's supposed to be in France. Jill: Anicka Haywood. Rick: Ed Kerr. Vince: Nick Zano.

Where to Watch

Episode 16

Lunar Eclipse of the Heart

Fri, Feb 6, 2004 30 mins

Holly dates Gary's boring boss, but when she tries to dump the guy, she sees Vince with another girl, so she prolongs the relationship to make Vince jealous. Meanwhile, Lauren learns that Valerie has applied for a job, so she quits the Tyler firm. Greg: Tommy Dewey. Waitress: Patrice Jennings. Liz: Jessica Szohr. Kate: Danneel Harris.

Where to Watch

Episode 17

Val and Holly's 'Not-Boyfriends'

Fri, Feb 13, 2004 30 mins

Holly struggles with her friendship with Vince and ends up offending him at the diner, but she only makes matters worse when she tries to apologize. Elsewhere, Valerie's friend Rick becomes obsessed with trivial things after a near-death experience on an airplane. Rick: Ed Kerr. Tyhler: Tracey McCall. Rhonda: Patrice Jennings.

Where to Watch

Episode 18

The Interview

Fri, Feb 20, 2004 30 mins

Holly postpones a college interview at the last minute so she can hang out with her friends, making Valerie angry since she spent time preparing her sister for the meeting. Elsewhere, Lauren finally does the deed with her new boyfriend, but it turns out to be a disappointing event. Brad: Ken Marino. Dr. Thompkins: John O'Brien. Woman: Hollie Hommel.

Where to Watch

Episode 19

The Big Picture

Fri, Mar 26, 2004 30 mins

Holly writes an essay that she hopes will win her an internship in Paris, but a computer glitch puts her plan in jeopardy. Meanwhile, Valerie hosts a party for Rick and his fiancée, a woman who learns some surprising things about the man she plans to marry. Rick: Ed Kerr. Julie: Lisa Arning. Kate: Danneel Harris.

Where to Watch

Episode 20

Rollin' in It

Fri, Apr 23, 2004 30 mins

Holly receives a large sum of money for her 18th birthday and decides to blow it on a big party, ignoring Valerie's advice to put it in the bank. However, the teen's irresponsibility with the cash gives her sister a chance to teach her a lesson. Brad: Ken Marino. Tina: Allison Munn.

Where to Watch

Episode 21

The Anti-Prom

Fri, Apr 30, 2004 30 mins

Holly throws a party for her classmates who are not going to the prom, but the evening doesn't quite go as planned. Elsewhere, Valerie gets an invitation to Rick's wedding, but she wonders if it was sent to her by mistake. Kate: Danneel Harris. Joanne: Jenna Heffernan. Pete: Peter Dirksen. Rhoda: Patrice Jennings.

Where to Watch
